resources.string: "For the app. to work you need to enable the Notification Listener Service. Enable it now?"
Make sure you go to this app\'s settings, enable notifications, and customize to your liking (e.g. lock screen/floating etc.)

MIUI 10 has issues showing notifications from some apps. The notifications from those troubled apps are recognized by the system, but they are immediately dismissed because there is an error showing the notification UI. This app will intercept those notifications, and re-show using a generic UI. Please post issues to github.com/FabioCZ/NotificationRepeater or PM me at /u/FabioCZ
Past apps that had errored notifications are below. Tap on each item to cycle through available notification icons.
Warning! the app will not work at all without notification access!
Enable notification actions (Expirimental - turn this off if you\'re having issues
